kickstart.post:
[main] cachedir=/var/cache/yum debuglevel=2 logfile=/var/log/yum.log pkgpolicy=newest distroverpkg=redhat-release tolerant=1 exactarch=1 assumeyes=1
pushd /etc/yum.repos.d if [ ! -d RCS ]; then mkdir -m 700 RCS chown 0:0 RCS fi
ext=$$ for repo in *repo; do /opt/rocks/bin/ci -l -m"Original File" $repo /bin/sed -e 's/^enabled[[:print:]]*//' $repo > $repo.$ext /bin/awk '{print};/^\[[[:print:]]*\]/ {print "enabled = 0 "}' $repo.$ext > $repo /bin/rm $repo.$ext /opt/rocks/bin/ci -l -m"Disabled by Rocks Post Config" $repo done popd
[Rocks-&version;] name=Rocks &version; baseurl=http://&Kickstart_PublicAddress;/install/&distribution;/&arch; enabled = 1
